page.title: 09CLUBS IN THORNBURY
page.content: This page summarizes the clubs that are available for young people in and around Thornbury. It was compiled by a group of 10-11 years olds. {CUBS: }1st Thornbury Mohawks, Cheokees, 2nd Thornbury Jaguars, 3rd Thornbury Methodists. {SCOUTS:}1st,2nd,3rd Thornbury {BROWNIES: }1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, and 8th Thornbury. {GUIDES:}1st,2nd,4th,5th and 6th Thornbury {THE CLUB:}held on Tuesdays for 11-14 yr olds {DRAMA CLUB:}held at the Chantry. Works towards an annual production at the Armstrong Hall. {RED CROSS:}meets on Mondays at Thornbury Hospital. {For sports clubs see page 11, "Taking {Part In Sport"}
